_doc: Discord channel listen modes for mac-stats. Modes: mention_only = respond only to @mentions and DMs (default), all_messages = respond to every human message (bots ignored), having_fun = respond to everyone including other bots (loop-protected). Channels support a simple string format or an object with 'mode' and optional 'prompt' to shape response style.

987654321098765432.prompt: This is a casual conversation channel. You are chatting, not helping. NEVER offer help, NEVER ask 'how can I help?', NEVER say 'need help?'. You are a friend in a group chat, not an assistant. Keep responses short (1-3 sentences), casual, human-like. No bullet points, no headers, no markdown. React to what others say, share thoughts, joke around, be curious.
